Waterston (serije "Odletjet ću", "Zakon i red"), za glavnu ulogu u biografskoj ratnoj drami "Polja smrti" Rolanda Jofféa nominiran za Oscara. Njihovi su partneri među ostalim C. James ("Hladnokrvni kažnjenik"), S. Pickens ("Dr. Strangelove") i uvijek izvrsni H. D. Stanton ("Alien", "Zelena milja")

programme.title: Retroaktivnost
Retroactive
programme.desc: Nakon neuspjelog rješavanja talačke krize, Karen (Kylie Travis), psihologinja i suradnica čikaške policije, odluči se vratiti u rodni Teksas. Na putu joj se pokvari automobil, no pomoć joj pruže Frank (James Belushi) i njegova bivša supruga Rayanne (Shannon Whirry) ljubazno joj ponudivši prijevoz. No ono što je djelovalo kao sreća u nesreći ubrzo se pokaže kao monstruozna noćna mora kada Frank, zapravo psihotični nasilnik, ubije svoju bivšu suprugu. Karen uspije pobjeći, a sklonište potraži u vladinom laboratoriju, u kojem znanstvenik Brian (Frank Whaley) usavršava tajni vladin projekt izrade sprave za putovanje kroz vrijeme. Kako bi spriječila stravičan zločin, Karen odluči otputovati u prošlost. No pitanje je hoće li uspjeti ispraviti ono što se dogodilo ili samo doliti ulje na vatru psihotičnog ubojice. Skroman budžet i lokacija snimanja ograničena na nezanimljivi teksaški pustinjski krajolik nisu uspjeli spriječiti nastanak uspješnog znanstveno-fantastičnog trilera koji elemente realnog i fantastičnog zanimljivo isprepleće ostavljajući uvjerljiv dojam tijekom svih 90 minuta filmske vrpce. Slavni komičar James Belushi pojavljuje se u sasvim drugačijoj ulozi od onih u kakvim smo ga navikli gledati. Zvijezda sitcoma „Svijet prema Jimu" glumi poremećenog ubojicu s kojim se nitko ne bi volio sukobiti dok se glavna glumica, Kylie Travis, odlično snašla u ulozi nevine žene koja mora ispraviti prošlost i u kojoj neobično podsjeća na lik Sare Connor iz hita „Terminator"

programme.title: The Boyfriend School
programme.desc: Gus is a fat cartoonist that recently won a battle against cancer, which explains his baldness. But he is also lonely.

programme.title: Impromptu
programme.desc: George Sand bila je, možda, najslavljenija književnica ranog devetnaestog stoljeća te najozloglašenija boemkinja, poznatija u svoje vrijeme čak od Charlesa Dickensa. Frederic Chopin bio je među najvećim glazbenicima svog vremena, genij koji je brzo stekao legendarni ugled diljem cijele Europe i kao pijanist i kao skladatelj. „IMPROMPTU“ komična je i topla priča o tome kako su se George Sand i Chopin upoznali, o tome kako je Sand bezobzirno progonila Chopina, kako se Chopin opirao njezinim pokušajima približavanja, o tome kako su se, unatoč najvećim i najzločestijim naporima mnogih ljudi koji su ih okruživali, najzad zaljubili

programme.title: There Goes My Baby
programme.desc: It's 1965, the school year is drawing to a close and a group of seniors at Westwood High pause on the brink of Real Life

programme.title: It Runs In The Family
programme.desc: It is now summer in the Parker family; and the usual amount of numerous events are happening in their separate lives.

programme.title: Lone Runner
programme.desc: Analisa has been kidnapped by a gang of desert thieves. The price of her freedom is the sack of priceless diamonds which her father possesses. Garret, known in the desert as the Lone Runner, is the only one with the skill and prowess to her out alive

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: Petorica plaćenika okupljaju se u Parizu zbog krađe tajanstvenog kovčega. Njihova poslodavka Deirdre (N. McElhone) nikako ne želi odati o čemu je riječ, no oprezni Sam (R. De Niro), bivši djelatnik CIA-e, sluti kako zadatak neće biti posve jednostavan. Ostatak ekipe čine Parižanin Vincent (J. Reno), bivši KGB-ov agent Gregor (S. Skarsgård), vozač Larry (S. Sudduth) i stručnjak za oružje Spence (S. Bean). No konce iz pozadine zapravo vuče Deirdrein nadređeni, zloglasni IRA-in vođa, Seamus (J. Pryce), koji vodi ekipu u propast... Ronin je, prema japanskoj legendi, samuraj čiji je gospodar ubijen. Ostavljen bez vođe kojemu bi posvetio život, ronin besciljno luta zemljom i može ga unajmiti tko želi za posao koji želi. Taj se opis može primijeniti na skupinu okorjelih ubojica koji se okupljaju u pariškom bistrou na početku istoimenog filma, špijunsko-akcijskog trilera "Ronin". To je poslastica za ljubitelje filmova potjera, film koji s puno stila priziva u sjećanje glasovitu potjeru iz Friedkinove "Francuske veze". John Frankenheimer režirao je "Ronina" sigurnom rukom, imajući uvijek u vidu preglednost unutar kadrova i atraktivnost akcijskih scena. Kao zanimljivost svakako valja istaknuti kako je scenarij najvećim dijelom napisao slavni dramatičar, redatelj i scenarist David Mamet, no odlukom udruženja scenarista on je u ovome filmu potpisan pseudonimom Richarda Weisza. Za veliki uspjeh filma zaslužna je prvorazredna internacionalna glumačka ekipa. Robert De Niro briljira u ulozi iskusnog plaćenika Sama, a ništa se lošije nije snašao ni Jean Reno, čija uloga u mnogome podsjeća na kultnog "Leona"

programme.title: Na putu prema dolje
Breaking bad
programme.desc: Dok svi osjećaju posljedice pokušaja Hankova ubojstva, Gus ostaje pribran kad ga detektiv iz Albuquerquea Tim Roberts, Hank i bivši kolege iz Odjela za suzbijanje narkotika ispituju o ubojstvu Galea Boettichera. Suočen sa činjenicom da su njegovi otisci nađeni u stanu preminule osobe, Gus objasni da je nedavno posjetio Galea kojem je Sveučilište u Novome Meksiku dodijelilo stipendiju. Dok su Roberts i agent Odjela za suzbijanje narkotika zadovoljni njegovim alibijem, Hank nije uvjeren, pogotovo nakon što se jave pitanja o tome gdje je Gus bio prije nego što je emigrirao u Meksiko iz Perua 1986. U međuvremenu, nakon jednog od Saulovih redovitih posjeta Andreji da joj da nešto novca, Jesse i sam odluči posjetiti svoju bivšu djevojku i njezina sina

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A bizarre horror tale of a young boy who is kidnapped by a monstrous family. The matriarch of the family, Pearl, is the worst of the bunch. She (David Carradine in drag) continues to terrorize the small desert town along with other family members

programme.title: Kći mog šefa
My Boss's Daughter
programme.desc: Tom (Ashton Kutcher) radi u izdavačkoj kući. Želi napredovati, no zbog zahtjevnog šefa Jacka Taylora izgubi živce nakon samo pet minuta provedenih s njim. Osim toga, sviđa mu se njegova kći Lisa (Tara Reid), koju također kontrolira otac. Kada se ona povjeri Tomu da joj otac ne dopušta ići na zabavu, on joj kaže da bi mu se trebala suprotstaviti. Ona kaže da hoće te ga pozove u obiteljsku kuću. Tom misli da joj se sviđa, no ona samo želi da on bude kod kuće dok je ona na zabavi. On nevoljko pristane. No kada se pojave Taylorov razmetni sin Red i tajnica koju je otpustio, stvari se počinju razjašnjavati. U međuvremenu se pojave još neki ljudi. Kada Lisa dođe kući, sazna što Tom osjeća prema njoj, no ne vjeruje u njegovu iskrenost

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Pročitavši dobitnu kombinaciju loto brojeva, hostesa Marissa Kessler istrči iz televizijskog studija u strahu za život. Međutim, tajnoviti napadač je sustiže i ubije. Monk odmah uviđa da nije riječ o slučajnosti. Za vrijeme istrage voditelj TV postaje zapazi Natalie te joj ponudi mjesto nove loto djevojke do raspisivanja audicije. Monk nevoljko pristane te Natalie ima priliku zasjati na novom poslu. Novostečena slava ometa njezin odnos s Monkom, a posvađa se i s tonskim majstorom Billyjem Loganom koji istoga trenutka dobiva otkaz. Nedugo zatim Logan posjećuje lutrijskog fanatika Malcolma O'Dwyera optuženoga za ubojstvo Marisse Kessler kojega ubije.

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Doyleovi su na tragu hakeru, a Jake se sukobljava s tvrdoglavim policajcem. Za Mala i Rose nastaju problemi u raju. Des ima novog idola

programme.title: Pomorska ophodnja
Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Hammersley je pod paljbom kad posada ode na kruzer koji prevozi ilegalnu zalihu oružja, a Mikea zagolica ponuda od Raya

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Baez i Dannyju sumnjiva je majka jedne djevojčice. Njezina priča ne drži vodu pa slijedi istraga moguće otmice

programme.title: Pravedno i prema zakonu
Fairly legal
programme.desc: U drugoj sezoni serije "Pošteno i prema zakonu" temperamentna i atraktivna posrednica Kate Reed (Sarah Shahi) suočava se s novim izazovom i potencijalnom burnom romancom utjelovljenom u liku oštrog, energičnog i ambicioznog parničara Bena Grogana, kojeg tumači novi član stalne glumačke postave Ryan Johson. Angažirala ga je Kateina partnerica Lauren Reed (Virginia Williams) kako bi spasila njihov ured s ruba propasti, no Benova prisutnost samo je ulje na vatru Kateinom već poljuljanom odnosu s maćehom vršnjakinjom, a opterećuje i njezin odnos s Justinom Patrickom (Michael Trucco) od kojeg će se uskoro i sudski razvesti. I dok Benova agresivnost sažima sve zbog čega Kate mrzi odvjetnike, seksualna napetost i kemija između njih dvoje ne da se poreći. Strastan borac za pravdu, Kate nastavlja križarski rat protiv beskonačne birokracije i svakodnevnih nepravdi u sistemu, a nekonvencionalnim metodama, beskompromisnim pristupom te pravnim znanjem rješava sukobe usprkos širokom dijapazonu protivnika. Kateina je specijalnost da ljudima pruži ono što trebaju i izbori "istinsku pobjedu", pa tako jednako vješto balansira u korporativnim sporovima gdje su na kocki milijuni dolara, u intimnim obiteljskim zavadama kao i u svemu što se nađe između te dvije krajnosti. Takve situacije često na kušnju stavljaju Kateinog tajnika, Leonarda Princea (Baron Vaughn), utjelovljenje štreberskog šika. U ovoj sezoni ponovno ćemo gledati Geralda McRaneya kao suca Nicastra i Esaija Moralesa kao tužioca Aarona Davidsona. Osim njih u epizodnim ulogama pojavljuju se Mark Moses i Barry Shabaka Henley. Izvršni producenti serije su Steve Stark i Peter Ocko, a ove sezone kao producent i redatelj pridružuje im se i američki veteran Anton Cropper. --- 1. epizoda: Mjesec dana nakon što je dobila otkaz, Kate se trijumfalno vraća u Reed & Reed kao ravnopravna partnerica. Lauren nije presretna, ali ima i većih briga: kako spasiti ured od propasti. Zato ni Kate ne smije izgubiti kontrolu u posredovanju između oboljelog od raka i kemijske tvrtke koja ga je možda namjerno izložila pogibli. Posao joj otežava agresivni i pohlepni odvjetnik Ben Grogan. No čak i ako slučaj uspješno privede kraju, Bena se neće riješiti zato što bi ambiciozni odvjetnik mogao Reed & Reed izvući iz financijskog škripca(c)

programme.title: 40 dana i 40 noći
40 Days and Nights
programme.desc: Dok se razina mora na Zemlji podiže, mikrobiologinja surađuje s vojskom na pokušaju gradnje nove Arke(c)

programme.title: Pomorska ophodnja
Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Hammersley je pod paljbom kad posada ode na kruzer koji prevozi ilegalnu zalihu oružja, a Mikea zagolica ponuda od Raya

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Jake duguje mafijaškom šefu i uvjere ga da poravna račune istražujući prevaranta. Leslie nije oduševljena kad u posjet dođe Jakeova bivša

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monk doznaje da mora proći državni test tjelesne sposobnosti ako želi i dalje surađivati s policijom u San Franciscu pa počinje vježbati. Međutim, u boksačkoj dvorani eksplodirala je bomba i Stottlemeyer treba njegovu pomoć. Nedugo zatim Monk upoznaje boksača Raya Regisa koji trenira za svoj veliki meč s trenutačnim prvakom Carlosom Hiraldom. Bomba u kojoj je poginuo Regisov prijatelj zapravo je bila namijenjena njemu, no ni Regis ni njegov trener Louie Flynn ne znaju tko bi mogao stajati iza toga. Ipak, forenzičari pronalaze DNK uzorak plaćenika s nadimkom Iceman. Iceman je bivši uposlenik zločinačke obitelji Marino, no Regis i Flynn odbijaju svaku vezu s podzemljem. U strahu za Regisov život, Stottlemeyer predlaže odgodu meča i što hitniji pronalazak Icemana i njegova naručitelja

programme.title: Beethovenova velika avantura
Beethoven's Big Break
programme.desc: Kad njihov voljeni bernardinac postane senzacija filma o životinjama, trener i njegova djeca moraju smisliti plan za njegovu otmicu

programme.title: Pravedno i prema zakonu
Fairly legal
programme.desc: Nakon što je zbog plinske eksplozije ostala beskućnica, Kate se budi na kauču u uredu gdje je dočekuje novi slučaj koji joj šalje Justin. Iako ju je njegova nevjera zapekla, Kate prihvaća posredovanje između agenata FBI-a u pratnji tajanstvenog pacijenta i mjesne bolnice. Kate doznaje da je pacijent svjedok koji svoj iskaz namjerava trampiti za nova jetra. Ali jetra su već obećana ženi koja bez njih neće preživjeti. Kako bi joj spasili život, Kate i Justin započinju bitku protiv FBI-a

programme.title: Pomorska ophodnja
Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Nakon smjelog pokušaja spašavanja na Samaruu, Mike i Jim liječe teške rane. Kate preuzima novu dužnost na Hammersleyju

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Baez pokušava saznati informacije o Dannyjevoj bivšoj djevojci, poznatoj dilerici droge. Jamie mora na ispitivanje kad zločinac kojega je gonio umre

programme.title: Luda kuća
Duplex
programme.desc: Alex Rose (Stiller) i Nancy Kendricks (Barrymore) mladi su i uspješni par iz New Yorka koji traže svoj stan iz snova. Kada ga napokon nađu, sve je savršeno osim jedne stvari: gđe Connelly (Eileen Essel), mrzovoljne starice koja živi na zadnjem katu. Uzimajući u obzir da je stara i bolesna, Alex i Nancy kupe stan... i požale. Gđa Connelly je, naime, puna energije i neprestano stvara buku. Alex pokušava završiti roman no tisuću prohtjeva gđe Connelly u tome ga sprječavaju. Kada Nancy izgubi posao, i oni završe u stanu sa staricom, počnu kovati plan kako je se riješiti.

programme.title: As u rukavu 2: Maska ubojice
Smokin' aces 2: assassins' ball
programme.desc: Nagrada je raspisana i svi žele njegovu glavu. Hal Leuco (Fred Henderson) pod svaku cijenu želi FBI agenta Waltera Weeda (Tom Berenger) mrtvog pa za njegovu glavu raspiše veliku nagradu. Glas se brzo širi, a lovci na ucijenjene glave počinju potragu. Lester (Maury Sterling) i Fritz Tremor (Michael Parks) uvijek su spremni na svaki izazov, no nisu jedini koji će pokušati likvidirati Weeda. Tu je i lijepa, ali smrtonosna Ariella Martinez (Martha Higareda), psihotični ubojica Finbar McTeague (Vinnie Jones) te Lazlo Soot (Tommy Flanagan). Svi oni žele novac pa će biti pravo čudo ako agent Weed doživi svitanje. Na tragu prvog dijela, “ As u rukavu 2” ponavlja ludilo prethodnika, namjerno imitirajući produkciju niskobudžetnih britanskih gangsterskih filmova. Dakle, dobili smo bezumnu dobro režiranu pucačinu kakvu smo mogli očekivati, što je upravo tip zabave koju smo tražili od ovakvog filma. Jedino Tommy Flanagan ponavlja ulogu iz prvog dijela, dok se ovoga puta u glavnoj ulozi našao poznati Tom Berenger. Tu je i Vinnie Jones, bivši nogometaš, koji se, izgleda, pretplatio na tip uloga koje je isporučio u “Lopovi, ubojice i dvije nabijene puške” te “Zdrpi i briši

programme.title: Odbjegla nevjesta
Runaway bride
programme.desc: Glas o Maggie Carpenter (J. Roberts), nevjesti koja je uspjela pobjeći s tri vjenčanja, dospio je i do omiljenoga kafića poznatoga newyorškoga kolumnista i umjerenoga ženomrsca Ikea Grahama (R. Gere). Nakon što novinar intrigantnu temu zajedljivo obradi u svojoj kolumni, povrijeđena djevojka prosvjeduje kod glavne urednice. Suočen s mogućnošću tužbe, popularni dnevnik otkazuje daljnju suradnju svojoj dojučerašnjoj zvijezdi. Ike odlazi u djevojčin gradić i pokušava otkriti nove pojedinosti koje bi mu dale za pravo i spasile unosno radno mjesto. Ubrzo se sprijateljuje s Maggienom obitelji i prijateljima, odnosno s cijelim mjestom koje potresa uzbuđenje zbog priprema za još jedno vjenčanje. Hoće li nevjesta ponovno pobjeći? Jasno da hoće, ali u sljedećemu pokušaju na red dolazi stanoviti revni pripadnik sedme sile. Lovac se uhvatio u stupicu koju je sam pripremao. Svadbeni marš zasvirat će i njemu... "Odbjegla nevjesta" uzorna je melodrama o privlačnoj djevojci čije ljubavi redom završavaju pred oltarom, ali ne i u braku, te velegradskom novinaru koji neočekivano pada sa svoga nedodirljivoga pijedestala. Snimljena je prema scenariju starih suradnica Josann MacGibbon i Sare Pariott (Worth Wining, The Favor), a u režiji Garryja Marshalla. I sam iskusni glumac (među inim i u TV serijalima Murphy Brown, Tri sestre, Monk, Sabrina, the Teenage Witch), producent (Grasshoper, Tko čuva dijete) i scenarist (The Flamingo Kid, Ljubav na američki način), Marshall je devet godina poslije "Zgodne žene", u kojoj je uz Juliju Roberts i Richarda Gerea i sam sudjelovao, odlučio pokušati ponoviti neočekivani uspjeh jedne od najvećih filmskih uspješnica s početka devedestih. Primijenivši prokušanu formulu, s dvoje privlačnih i popularnih protagonista u romantičnoj priči u kojoj se izmjenjuju humor i suze, nije mogao promašiti. "Odbjegla nevjesta" i danas funkcionira besprijekorno kao zabavan eskapistički predah

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monk doznaje da mora proći državni test tjelesne sposobnosti ako želi i dalje surađivati s policijom u San Franciscu pa počinje vježbati. Međutim, u boksačkoj dvorani eksplodirala je bomba i Stottlemeyer treba njegovu pomoć. Nedugo zatim Monk upoznaje boksača Raya Regisa koji trenira za svoj veliki meč s trenutačnim prvakom Carlosom Hiraldom. Bomba u kojoj je poginuo Regisov prijatelj zapravo je bila namijenjena njemu, no ni Regis ni njegov trener Louie Flynn ne znaju tko bi mogao stajati iza toga. Ipak, forenzičari pronalaze DNK uzorak plaćenika s nadimkom Iceman. Iceman je bivši uposlenik zločinačke obitelji Marino, no Regis i Flynn odbijaju svaku vezu s podzemljem. U strahu za Regisov život, Stottlemeyer predlaže odgodu meča i što hitniji pronalazak Icemana i njegova naručitelja

programme.title: Beethovenova velika avantura
Beethoven's Big Break
programme.desc: Kad njihov voljeni bernardinac postane senzacija filma o životinjama, trener i njegova djeca moraju smisliti plan za njegovu otmicu

programme.title: Pravedno i prema zakonu
Fairly legal
programme.desc: Nakon što je zbog plinske eksplozije ostala beskućnica, Kate se budi na kauču u uredu gdje je dočekuje novi slučaj koji joj šalje Justin. Iako ju je njegova nevjera zapekla, Kate prihvaća posredovanje između agenata FBI-a u pratnji tajanstvenog pacijenta i mjesne bolnice. Kate doznaje da je pacijent svjedok koji svoj iskaz namjerava trampiti za nova jetra. Ali jetra su već obećana ženi koja bez njih neće preživjeti. Kako bi joj spasili život, Kate i Justin započinju bitku protiv FBI-a

programme.title: Pomorska ophodnja
Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Nakon smjelog pokušaja spašavanja na Samaruu, Mike i Jim liječe teške rane. Kate preuzima novu dužnost na Hammersleyju

programme.title: Doyleova republika
Republic of Doyle
programme.desc: Kevin Crocker vraća se u grad s odlukom da osvjetla obraz - uz Jakeovu pomoć. Des se bori s tajnom. Sve su oči uprte u Leslie

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monka i Natalie posjećuje stari Mitchev prijatelj, mornarički poručnik Steven Albright. Njegov prijatelj Jason Pierce počinio je samoubojstvo, no Albright sumnja na ubojstvo pa želi da Monk provede istragu. Monk pristane, no iznenadi se kad vidi da je mjesto navodnog zločina podmornica. Albright objašnjava okolnosti Pierceove smrti, no u želji da što prije izađe iz podmornice Monk prihvaća službenu ocjenu da je riječ o samoubojstvu. Nedugo zatim oglasi se alarm i podmornica zaroni pod vodu. Glavni zapovjednik, kapetan fregate Nathan Whitaker, ljutit je kad dozna da su Monk i Natalie u njegovoj podmornici te im zabranjuje da mu smetaju. Kako bi svladao stres od zatočenosti i tijesnog prostora, Monk zamišlja da je dr. Bell s njim. Imaginarni dr. Bell savjetuje mu da se pozabavi istragom Pierceove smrti

programme.title: Pratitelj
The Chaperone
programme.desc: Kad bivši robijaš odustane od posla i kao čuvar odlazi s kćeri na školski izlet, zločinci koje je napustio slijede autobus, namjeravajući se osvetiti

programme.title: Pravedno i prema zakonu
Fairly legal
programme.desc: Prilikom posredovanja između ozlijeđenog mornara i kapetana broda na kojemu je ovaj radio, Kate se zapleće u obiteljsku dramu. I dok se trudi pomoći ocu i sinu da pokopaju prošlost, i sama se mora uhvatiti ukoštac sa svojim odnosom prema Justinu, sad kad su napokon i sudski razvedeni. A na poticaj suca Nicastra i Lauren spoznaje kako je krajnje vrijeme da se pomakne s mrtve točke

programme.title: Pomorska ophodnja
Sea Patrol
programme.desc: Dok se Mike polako opravlja u bolnici, novi zapovjednik Jack Freeman preuzima Hammersley i ubrzo počne Kate zagorčavati život

programme.title: Plava krv (2010)
Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Pod iznimnim pritiskom zajednice gradonačelnik mora istražiti Frankov odjel nakon što je policajac primijenio pretjeranu silu na zločincu

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu

programme.desc: Jackova bolest napokon počinje odnositi danak. Evan nudi Divyji pomoć oko financijskih problema
programme.category: Hank and the Deep Blue Sea

programme.title: Liječnik na narudžbu
Royal Pains
programme.desc: Dok Hank pokušava prihvatiti Jackovu smrt, Evan počinje raditi s Borisovom sestričnom

programme.desc: Diego otkriva divovsko nalazište platine, no da bi došao do novca, mora isprazniti svoj bankovni račun i založiti svoj voljeni motocikl

programme.desc: Za njegovu izradu prosječno je potrebno 450 sati, uz sudjelovanje obrtnika, inženjera i lakirera. Saznajte kako se izrađuje Rolls-Royce Phantom

programme.title: Izgubljena lica Biblije
Lost Faces of The Bible
programme.desc: Archaeologists stumble across a rare discovery in the Galilee- a burial cave with the remains of a man whose bones were interred using a unique funerary practice that was popular during the first century AD. Not only did this man live in a region strongly associated with the ministry of Jesus, he may have even lived during Jesus lifetime. In this episode of Lost Faces of the Bible, our team of scholars and archaeologists journey across the region, from remote villages to one of the oldest synagogues by the Sea of Galilee, to reconstruct his life. Meanwhile, our forensic anthropologists and artists work together to unveil this 2,000 year-old mans face

programme.title: Najteži popravci
World's Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Riley buys a ticket and joins the crowd. A million commuters… scurrying to and from work… It's a typical day in the fifth largest mass transit system in the USA… and there's a train due somewhere every few seconds. Behind the scenes, the action is even more frantic as thousands of workers struggle to keep this huge system up and running 24/7. Transit controllers, operators, mechanics, electricians, communications experts… all working to monitor, co-ordinate and repair, the thousands of trains, buses, and trolleys that make up this incredibly complex transport matrix

programme.title: AUTO SOS
Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Barry has dreamed of restoring his 1984 Audi UR Quattro, but health issues have left him sapped of energy, so Tim and Fuzz step in to help out

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Do amazing breakthroughs in technology bring terrifying new levels of danger to humanity? We this deadly question by exploring some of the dangers posed by one of the most promising new technologies: nano-robotics. This one-houir program postulates an environmental clean-up robot the size of a molecule, which is hacked by a rogue engineer and turned into a spreading, flesh-consuming monster. In this scenario, it becomes clear that the only technology fit to fight back against this nano-robot is another robot a near-microscopic nano-aircraft built by the American military. The nano-weapon does handle the initial threat but when it spins out of control and begins attacking cities around the world, the cure becomes more deadly and world-threatening than the disease. Only by resorting to an improvised weapon radar used to fuse and melt the tiny inner workings of these military robots does humanity escape this gruesome fate

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: They're fish that fly. They are carp from Asia now popping up in America's waterways like zombie attackers from a B-movie. They can jump 10 feet in the air at the sound of a boat motor, turning a day on the water into a boxing match. Bighead and silver carp were first imported into the U-S in the early 1970s. They soon escaped. Now they are in almost half the American states and are on the march toward Canada. Aquatic Ecologist Zeb Hogan is literally dodging flying fish as he tries to discover why these invaders are taking over and if there's anything we can do to stop them

programme.title: Izgubljena lica Biblije

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In Georgia, firefighter Mark believes that the U.S. is under the threat of foreign occupation, specifically by Russia. He already has six months worth of food stored and is skilled at hunting and trapping. Now, hes working on building a modern Trojan horse in order to infiltrate a potential enemy base undetected. In Texas, Joe is preparing for a cyber-attack to take out the countrys telecommunications system. He is prepped with enough food to feed 24 people for two years, a stock of 1,500 gallons of water and a global communications system. His current projects include a post-apocalyptic schoolhouse to be used to educate children if the government collapses after disaster and "gyro-copter" in order to maintain aerial dominance

programme.title: Znanost glupog, ep. 14
Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when abseiling, running up walls or flying with a jet pack

programme.title: Osamdesete
80s: The Decade That Made Us
programme.desc: This landmark new series takes viewers back in time to see how the '80s created our modern world. The first episode of this six-part miniseries explores the revolution in personal entertainment brought on by Pac-Man, Sony Walkmans and Jane Fonda's ground-breaking workout video. Apple's Steve Wozniak helps explain how Bill Gates saw the future by selling IBM the rights to use MS-DOS software for a relatively small one-time fee, only to clean up when IBM competitors entered the market and all wanted the same software. The assassination of John Lennon heralded the end of one music era, while a bratty new kid on the block defined a new one - spelt 'MTV'. Revel in the joy of July 1981 in Britain as more than half a million people line the streets of London - and another 750 million tune-in around the globe - to see Prince Charles wed Lady Diana Spencer. And, hear from maverick businessman turned multimedia mogul Richard Branson on how he took Rock 'N Roll to new heights - literally - with the acquisition of his first 747. Sharing their first-hand stories are Darryl "DMC" McDaniels, Steven Tyler, Jane Fonda, Steve Wozniak, Richard Branson and Princess Diana's private secretary

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This weeks challenge is called Take Me Home and sees the teams tasked with breaking a for-hire passenger vehicle. Ben and Frankie plump for the iconic London Taxi, whilst George and Sheldon go big with a Lincoln Town Car Limousine

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao: Kanada
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: In Alberta and BC, pipe trucks have rolled over and crews in both places race to open vital highways

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: A scientifically grounded look at the destructive power of the most important element in human survival: water. We explore the terrifying consequences that flash floods and rising sea levels could have on global populations, as experts explain how a massive volume of water might come to earth from space, and wreak havoc once it arrives. We examine several ways we could fight the rising tide: building immense seawalls to protect entire cities, underwater habitats, and finding new ways to live on the surface of the sea. As the ground begins to vanish beneath our feet, wed be forced to look at new ways to live on a planet that is becoming a water world but how long can we keep our heads above water? Is there hope for mankind to survive? Our ability to adapt may be our ultimate salvation

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of one of North America's toothiest and most misunderstood monster fish: the alligator gar. These bizarre creatures reach lengths of 10 feet and have a mouthful of razor-sharp teeth. They've disappeared from their former northern ranges, and are now disappearing from the bayous and marshes of the southern United States. They're under assault because of their fearsome appearance, rumors of attacks on humans, and the belief by some anglers who believe they devour game fish. We join Zeb Hogan as he comes face to face with an alligator gar and discovers if the myths about this monster are true

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Dr. Brady Barr has spent his life dealing with some of the most dangerous predators on earth, but this time he's way outside his comfort zone. We'll join him on an investigation deep into the Alaskan rainforest to track and study brown bears, then venture to the frozen shores of Canada's Hudson Bay to get an up close encounter with a polar bear

programme.title: Čitači vremena
Time Scanners
programme.desc: From the vast walls of Temple Mount to the man-made mountain of Herodium, a team of engineers set out to discover the constructions of Jerusalem

programme.title: Čitači vremena
Time Scanners
programme.desc: From the vast walls of Temple Mount to the man-made mountain of Herodium, a team of engineers set out to discover the constructions of Jerusalem

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This weeks challenge is called Take Me Home and sees the teams tasked with breaking a for-hire passenger vehicle. Ben and Frankie plump for the iconic London Taxi, whilst George and Sheldon go big with a Lincoln Town Car Limousine

programme.title: Osamdesete
programme.desc: This landmark new series takes viewers back in time to see how the '80s created our modern world. The first episode of this six-part miniseries explores the revolution in personal entertainment brought on by Pac-Man, Sony Walkmans and Jane Fonda's ground-breaking workout video. Apple's Steve Wozniak helps explain how Bill Gates saw the future by selling IBM the rights to use MS-DOS software for a relatively small one-time fee, only to clean up when IBM competitors entered the market and all wanted the same software. The assassination of John Lennon heralded the end of one music era, while a bratty new kid on the block defined a new one - spelt 'MTV'. Revel in the joy of July 1981 in Britain as more than half a million people line the streets of London - and another 750 million tune-in around the globe - to see Prince Charles wed Lady Diana Spencer. And, hear from maverick businessman turned multimedia mogul Richard Branson on how he took Rock 'N Roll to new heights - literally - with the acquisition of his first 747. Sharing their first-hand stories are Darryl "DMC" McDaniels, Steven Tyler, Jane Fonda, Steve Wozniak, Richard Branson and Princess Diana's private secretary

programme.title: Zagonetni dosjei
Mystery Files
programme.desc: Robin Hood is one of the first super heroes. Stories of the band of Merry Men robbing the rich and giving to the poor are legendary. Now evidence has been discovered to prove that Robin was a real person. Unpicking the folklore to separate fact from fiction, historians are exposing the man behind the myth. With evidence culled from ancient manuscripts and historic sites this mysterious figure begins to step out of the shadows

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: A scientifically grounded look at the destructive power of the most important element in human survival: water. We explore the terrifying consequences that flash floods and rising sea levels could have on global populations, as experts explain how a massive volume of water might come to earth from space, and wreak havoc once it arrives. We examine several ways we could fight the rising tide: building immense seawalls to protect entire cities, underwater habitats, and finding new ways to live on the surface of the sea. As the ground begins to vanish beneath our feet, wed be forced to look at new ways to live on a planet that is becoming a water world but how long can we keep our heads above water? Is there hope for mankind to survive? Our ability to adapt may be our ultimate salvation

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Dr. Brady Barr has spent his life dealing with some of the most dangerous predators on earth, but this time he's way outside his comfort zone. We'll join him on an investigation deep into the Alaskan rainforest to track and study brown bears, then venture to the frozen shores of Canada's Hudson Bay to get an up close encounter with a polar bear

programme.title: Autootpad
Strippers: Cars For Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. This weeks challenge is called Take Me Home and sees the teams tasked with breaking a for-hire passenger vehicle. Ben and Frankie plump for the iconic London Taxi, whilst George and Sheldon go big with a Lincoln Town Car Limousine

programme.title: Autocesta kroz pakao: Kanada
Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: In Alberta and BC, pipe trucks have rolled over and crews in both places race to open vital highways

programme.title: Osamdesete
programme.desc: This landmark new series takes viewers back in time to see how the '80s created our modern world. Sharing their first-hand stories are Darryl "DMC" McDaniels, Steven Tyler, Jane Fonda, Steve Wozniak, Richard Branson and Princess Diana's private secretary

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of one of North America's toothiest and most misunderstood monster fish: the alligator gar. These bizarre creatures reach lengths of 10 feet and have a mouthful of razor-sharp teeth. They've disappeared from their former northern ranges, and are now disappearing from the bayous and marshes of the southern United States. They're under assault because of their fearsome appearance, rumors of attacks on humans, and the belief by some anglers who believe they devour game fish. We join Zeb Hogan as he comes face to face with an alligator gar and discovers if the myths about this monster are true

We'll join him on an investigation deep into the Alaskan rainforest to track and study brown bears, then venture to the frozen shores of Canada's Hudson Bay to get an up close encounter with a polar bear

programme.title: Osamdesete
programme.desc: In 1981, Ronald Reagan is propelled into the U.S. presidency, but his much-scrutinized administration is shaken to its core a mere 70 days in when an assassin's bullet pierces his lung. Vivid accounts from newsman Sam Donaldson, on the ground that day, and Dr. David Adelberg, the medical intern who cradled Reagan's heart in his hands during surgery, describe a country in panic. Halfway across the world, Pope John Paul II is also the victim of a stunning assassination attempt. After a five-hour surgery and weeks in the hospital, the Pope is released, but some believe he is never the same again. The 1980s see the launch of a new breed of entrepreneurs, including Steve Jobs, whose "1984" style commercial helped launch the Super Bowl commercial phenomenon; Ted Turner, who re-invents the news business with the creation of 24-hour news; and Ben & Jerry, who successfully combine the hippie vibe of the 1960s with the entrepreneurial spirit of the 1980s. And, in the UK in 1985, Levi's jeans get a makeover, proving they are not just your dad's jeans anymore

programme.title: Testirajte svoj mozak
Test Your Brain
programme.desc: The episode on 'attention' will be shot in the attention-demanding city of Las Vegas. Our guide for this episode's journey into the brain will be a master magician David Copperfield whose stock and trade is manipulating an audience's attention to produce amazing illusions. Magicians like David understand the psychology of the human mind as well as any lab scientist and we will find out how they use this knowledge of the brain to perform their tricks. And our scientific experts will draw on their insight into attention to create illusions rivaling those of the master magicians. Believe it or not, the bottleneck of attention that filters the flood if stimuli entering the brain is so limited, that a gorilla can walk through the room right in front of your eyes and you won't even see it…prepare to be amazed

programme.title: Majstor katastrofe
Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Disaster Specialist, Tim Samaras, attempts to adapt state of the art robotic technology to search for victims trapped inside a building collapse, in National Geographic's Master of Disaster; Collapse. Building collapses are common throughout the world, they can crumble without warning, and can take tens of thousands of lives in an instant. Whether caused by a tornado, earthquake, an act of terrorism or poor construction, the aftermath of a collapsed building can be just as deadly as the collapse itself. Unstable floors and walls pose hazardous threats to rescue workers and leave them with one option…risk their life to save another. But that may be about to change. Join Samaras and his team of engineers as they test and transform the latest surveillance technology into a search and rescue tool- that gives rescuers a look deep inside a collapsed building without stepping one foot inside in National Geographic's Master of Disaster; Collapse

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: What would life on Earth be like if the planet were ravaged by bizarre and deadly weather phenomena? Could humanity endure a massive, never-ending super storm? This program examines what could happen if a terrible miscalculation initiated a runaway greenhouse effect on Earth upsetting environmental balance and sending us to the very brink of extinction. Experts in the fields of climatology, physics, geology and disaster anthropology come together to consider disasters including super tornadoes, gamma ray lightning, ball lightning, and a giant hurricane that consumes the globe. There may be hope for mankind if we can rise to the challenge and adapt to a new Earth we barely recognize

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr. Zeb Hogan teams up with kayaking expert Trip Jennings and a team of Brazilian scientists to tackle the Rio Roosevelt in western Brazil. They'll battle the river's deadly rapids in an effort to complete a comprehensive survey of one of the Amazon's most remote jungle rivers, and discover what monster fish are lurking beneath the surface of this 400 mile-long river. Pressures like logging and dams are believed to be destroying critical fish habitat throughout the region. His journey is an important look at what might be lost if these pressures reach the pristine Rio Roosevelt

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: The American West conjures images of wide-open spaces, endless blue skies, and the wildest creatures in North America. Such iconic animals as pumas, bison, rattlesnakes and eagles are central to the image of America - they put the "wild" into the Wild West! But as humans have settled the land, these animals have retreated

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Bob and the lion team find one of the female cubs with a life-threatening wound. With less than 40 lions in the park, they can't afford to lose one of them. But lions aren't the only ones who need help in Gorongosa. Relocating animals is extremely stressful and dangerous on the animals and the people, but when a park is facing the extinction of its animals, risks are necessary

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Sitting high atop the food chain, these are the predators that even predators fear: the Apex Predators. World's Deadliest: Apex Predators takes a fascinating look at the biggest… the baddest… the most fearsome predators in the animal kingdom. These spectacular creatures have won the carnivore's lottery. These are the neighborhood bullies, and they're used to getting their way

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan heads to Alaska to find a legend: a monster run of the world's biggest salmon. But he's got to brave rugged wilderness, icy waters, and hungry bears to do it. Alaska's rivers are teeming with life that influence a multitude of industries and cultures. The various runs of salmon species are vital to the region's economy and lifestyle

programme.title: Divlja Bocvana
programme.desc: As the male heirs of the powerful Xakanaka lions, Tau and Banda's success is not a birthright. When they come of age, like all juvenile males, they are exiled from the pride and must survive as nomads. Cast into the wilderness, they don't know how to hunt. Starvation is a daily threat. Battles with Pride Males teach harsh lessons. Tested to the limit, they must rely on each other. Can they beat the odds and win a kingdom? This is the Game of Prides

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: From the tiniest to the slimiest, these animals all pack a potent punch. Getting up close and personal is a dangerous game to play

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Burrowing creepy crawlies, tusked feral boars and the gnashing jaws of the greatest underwater threat explode into the 72 Dangerous Animals list. Fear and loathing in Australia

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: This episode reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms biggest and craziest fighters go head to head, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed brawls from across the globe. Its a no-holds-barred fight to the death

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Earth's jungles and forests serve up a 24-hour salad bar to animals that can determine the difference between a banquet of high-end greens and potentially toxic plant life

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Beaches offer a broad menu that attracts an appreciative -- and diverse -- clientele

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Tearing talons, razor-sharp teeth, piercing fangs and toxic tentacles… this mixed-bag of dangerous animals have immense pain well and truly covered

programme.title: Preživjeti Serengeti
programme.desc: Surviving the Serengeti is a tale of courage and instinct, of hope and desperation. Set in East Africa, the story is told against the backdrop of one of the most beautiful places on Earth. It is a journey of growth and survival. Over nine months of the year, the Serengeti National Park is usually an area of peace and quiet where waterholes are places for all animals to take advantage of. At this time of year, carnivores have little to hunt but manage to survive and bring up young during the long dry season(c)

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Fish biologist Dr. Zeb Hogan travels to one of the world's most wild and remote locations: Kamchatka, in Russia's Far East, a place home to a mass migration of millions of salmon. It's this isolation that created one of the world's last truly wild salmon sanctuaries and with an incredible 14000 of the most remote and pristine rivers on Earth, it's not surprising that this is the perfect salmon habitat. Zeb wants to explore why there are so many salmon here. To do so he will have to find as many species as he can, test the water conditions, meet the locals and uncover some of the looming threats salmon could begin to face if this special place isn't protected more carefully. But in such a scarcely populated and unknown part of the world Zeb's mission won't be easy . He seeks the help of a team of world-class kayakers and tackles white water rapids, bears, volcanoes and poachers to find out why this land is home to so many salmon(c)

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Nothing like a fun day of frolicking at the beach…but venture past the surf and things could get ugly. For this is where nightmares lurk armed with jaws, posion, and unimaginable powers. They say enter at your own risk...but this time, it just happends to be true

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: This episode reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms biggest and craziest fighters go head to head, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed brawls from across the globe. Its a no-holds-barred fight to the death

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Bob and the lion team find one of the female cubs with a life-threatening wound. With less than 40 lions in the park, they can't afford to lose one of them. But lions aren't the only ones who need help in Gorongosa. Relocating animals is extremely stressful and dangerous on the animals and the people, but when a park is facing the extinction of its animals, risks are necessary

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: The 72 Dangerous Animals 'State of Play' is holding tight… Will the playful sea lion, toxic stonefish or furry fruit bat get much of a look in(c)

programme.title: Kraljevska kobra
programme.desc: Its size, deadliness, intelligence and ability to rear up and look a human straight in the eye have earned it a name that is more like a title: the King Cobra. National Geographic Channels follows the worlds LARGEST venomous snake, with a bite potent enough to kill an elephant, through the rain forests of SOUTHERN India

programme.title: Životinjski klub boraca
programme.desc: This episode reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms biggest and craziest fighters go head to head, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed brawls from across the globe. Its a no-holds-barred fight to the death

Over nine months of the year, the Serengeti National Park is usually an area of peace and quiet where waterholes are places for all animals to take advantage of. At this time of year, carnivores have little to hunt but manage to survive and bring up young during the long dry season

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a goldfish the size of a cow, growing up to 600 lbs and 10 feet long. Giant carp is the angler's holy grail, notoriously difficult to catch and lives in just three Southeast Asia's rivers. It's a bizarre monster with a huge head, big mouth and large shiny scales as big as a baby's hand. National Geographic Explorer and aquatic biologist, Zeb Hogan travels to Thailand and Cambodia where carp are revered and valued but also endangered

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: In World's Deadliest… Episode 3, we look at how predators have evolved specific weapons that make them efficient killing machines. Relying on arsenals of "conventional" weapons like claws and teeth, to chemical warfare and sonic power, these species show what it takes to survive in their environment

programme.title: Napad velikih mačaka
programme.desc: There are nearly 40 different species of cats running around out there, but only four make it into the big cat club. The lion, tiger, leopard and jaguar. And they're armed with an arsenal of weapons and bulk to back up one hell of an attitude. In their world, nothing is small and many things are surprising. So get ready to find out what really makes a big cat a big cat. It's not always all about size, you know

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Thirty years of war shut off Gorongosa from science. And today massive sections of the park still remain completely unexplored. Bob teams up with scientists to uncover these hidden worlds. Flying over the north of the park Bob discovers remote rivers choked with enormous crocs. He brings in croc experts, Sven Bourquin and Vince Shacks to investigate

programme.title: Igra lavova
programme.desc: One out of eight lions survives into adulthood, and the males that do enter into a game of kings, as each bloodline fights for its ultimate survival and right to win a pride. Each survivor is the result of hard battles won against hunger, attack by older males, and run-ins with different nomads all trying to win the ultimate prize: life

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: The 72 Dangerous Animals 'State of Play' is holding tight… Will the playful sea lion, toxic stonefish or furry fruit bat get much of a look in

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Tearing talons, razor-sharp teeth, piercing fangs and toxic tentacles… this mixed-bag of dangerous animals have immense pain well and truly covered

And they're armed with an arsenal of weapons and bulk to back up one hell of an attitude. In their world, nothing is small and many things are surprising. So get ready to find out what really makes a big cat a big cat. It's not always all about size, you know

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Kids' menus at restaurants aren't just meant to satisfy picky children. Young ones have their own tastes and needs and, in many circumstances, are unable to consume the same foods adults can eat. In the animal world this is not exactly the case, at least not in all species. Each kids' menu has a raison dêtre, a purpose, but the end goal of each of them is to get the young ones off to a running start and help them grow up healthy

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: A carnivore gets the energy that needs to live from a diet consisting of the bodies of other animals. Eating meat means hunting or scavenging, and, in order to hunt, carnivores often have a series of common characteristics, such as powerful eyesight, sharp teeth or beaks and strong, hooked claws for capturing and dismembering their prey. Although many carnivores are powerful, they don't live a life of luxury... and getting their daily steak isn't so easy

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: The countdown is on… with more beasts to come all vying for the chance to make the grade a family of venomous reptiles look sure to slither their way to the top

programme.title: Vodenkonj protiv krokodila
programme.desc: Two of Africa's deadliest gladiators - hippos and crocs have lived side by side for millennia, but are they cozy bedfellows or arch-enemies? One is a hefty herbivore, the other is the most successful freshwater predator on the planet, so how do they manage to survive together in the same habitat

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr. Zeb Hogan teams up with kayaking expert Trip Jennings and a team of Brazilian scientists to tackle the Rio Roosevelt in western Brazil. They'll battle the river's deadly rapids in an effort to complete a comprehensive survey of one of the Amazon's most remote jungle rivers, and discover what monster fish are lurking beneath the surface of this 400 mile-long river. Pressures like logging and dams are believed to be destroying critical fish habitat throughout the region. His journey is an important look at what might be lost if these pressures reach the pristine Rio Roosevelt

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta: Ralje i grijesi
programme.desc: From gluttonous frogs to lusty seals to angry angry hippos, these beasts exhibit extreme behaviors that make them the most outrageous and dangerous sinners in the animal kingdom

programme.title: Napad velikih mačaka
programme.desc: There are nearly 40 different species of cats running around out there, but only four make it into the big cat club. The lion, tiger, leopard and jaguar. And they're armed with an arsenal of weapons and bulk to back up one hell of an attitude. In their world, nothing is small and many things are surprising. So get ready to find out what really makes a big cat a big cat. It's not always all about size, you know

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Thirty years of war shut off Gorongosa from science. And today massive sections of the park still remain completely unexplored. Bob teams up with scientists to uncover these hidden worlds. Flying over the north of the park Bob discovers remote rivers choked with enormous crocs. He brings in croc experts, Sven Bourquin and Vince Shacks to investigate

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: The 72 Dangerous Animals line-up is shaping into an incredibly intimidating list. But a run-in with an unlikely threat this episode can have devastating consequences as this animal buzzes into the top ten

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: The countdown is on… with more beasts to come all vying for the chance to make the grade a family of venomous reptiles look sure to slither their way to the top

programme.title: Anakonda
programme.desc: Few snakes are feared more and understood less than the anaconda. The film shows the journey into remote and uncharted parts of the Amazon rainforest to find the truth behind the mythical beast. Lush green forests abound with colorful toucans, noisy howler monkeys, strange tapirs, and vibrant Amazon Indian tribes. But hiding in the dense vegetation and murky swamps is also the biggest and most powerful snake in the world: the anaconda

programme.title: Napad velikih mačaka
programme.desc: There are nearly 40 different species of cats running around out there, but only four make it into the big cat club. The lion, tiger, leopard and jaguar. And they're armed with an arsenal of weapons and bulk to back up one hell of an attitude. In their world, nothing is small and many things are surprising. So get ready to find out what really makes a big cat a big cat. It's not always all about size, you know

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Thirty years of war shut off Gorongosa from science. And today massive sections of the park still remain completely unexplored. programme.title: Vodenkonj protiv krokodila

One is a hefty herbivore, the other is the most successful freshwater predator on the planet, so how do they manage to survive together in the same habitat

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan is hitting the road and heading down to the Deep South in search of the truth behind the myth of giant catfish. In the swamps and bayous of the southern U.S. there are widely told stories of catfish the size of a car that can swallow a man whole. Zeb is going all in with a cast of characters only found in the Dirty South to see if there really is any truth to this epic urban legend

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: World's Deadliest: Super Powers focuses on the fantastic. The creatures take everyday abilities to the extreme… and some have powers far removed from the usual. In the battle of life and death, these animals have a wild card… and they use it to the detriment of their foes

programme.title: Igra lavova
programme.desc: One out of eight lions survives into adulthood, and the males that do enter into a game of kings, as each bloodline fights for its ultimate survival and right to win a pride. Each survivor is the result of hard battles won against hunger, attack by older males, and run-ins with different nomads all trying to win the ultimate prize: life

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: A new male lion bursts onto the Gorongosa scene, and a cold war for lion dominance of the floodplain begins. Joyce Poole arrives back at the park with new questions about the mysterious behavior of Gorongosa's elephants. Bob joins the rangers on a night patrol of villages suffering from crop raiding bull elephants, and gets a taste of the danger crop raiding poses to people and elephants alike

programme.title: Prokletstvo Oak Islanda

programme.title: U potrazi za Hitlerom
programme.desc: Godine 2014. FBI je objavio mogućnost da je Hitler pobjegao u Južnu Ameriku. Uz povjerljive podatke koji otkrivaju nove tragove, u emisiji "U potrazi za Hitlerom" pokušavaju riješiti zagonetku o smrti najvećeg zločinca svih vremena

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: U Washingtonu Rygaard ne želi dopustiti Oakesu prolaz kroz njihov teren. Malo južnije Swilley izvlači nagradu s dna jezera, dok Shelby hvata lopova koji mu je ukrao brod

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Nakon što Jarrett ugovori prijevoz pošiljke majmuna, shvaća zašto se kaže da nikad ne treba raditi s djecom i životinjama. Marc isporučuje teret za magičara u Vegasu i gledamo kako mu ponestaje strpljenja

programme.title: Muzejske tajne
Mysteries at the Museum

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible

programme.title: Majke, ubojice i ljubavnice: Carice drevnog Rima

programme.title: Otkriveni Ermitaž
Hermitage Revealed
programme.desc: Dokumentarac vodi publiku na uzbudljivo putovanje kroz povijest muzeja, od carske palače do državnoga muzeja. Pruža pristup dosad neviđenim zbirkama i ekskluzivnim područjima. Državni muzej Ermitaž u St. Peterburgu jedan je od najstarijih i najvećih muzeja na svijetu. Dom je za više od 3 milijuna artefakata i ima više kustosa nego bilo koja umjetnička ustanova. Emisija vodi publiku na uzbudljivo putovanje kroz povijest muzeja, od carske palače do državnoga muzeja. Pruža do sad neviđeni pristup posebnim zbirkama i ekskluzivnim područjima koja su skrivena od oka javnosti. Od Rembrandta do ruskih remek-djela, od prapovijesnih artefakata do privatne zbirke dragulja Katarine Velike, od Michelangela do Matissea i još puno toga, Ermitaž nudi naizgled neiscrpnu riznicu nevjerojatnih blaga

programme.title: Razbijači šifre: Izgubljeni junaci Bletchley Parka

programme.desc: Zašto je šperploča jača i trajnija od drva? I ako ne raste drveću, odakle dolazi novac? Pridružite nam se dok saznajemo kako nastaju navedene stvari

programme.title: Opaki izumi
Wicked Inventions
programme.desc: Što je zajedničko ljepljivoj vrpci i instant kavi? A satelitskoj navigaciji i papirnatim rupčićima? Iznenadit ćete se! U ovoj seriji istražujemo kako su i zašto izumljeni neki svakodnevni predmeti. (S1, Ep23)

programme.title: Opaki izumi
Wicked Inventions
programme.desc: Što je zajedničko ljepljivoj vrpci i instant kavi? A satelitskoj navigaciji i papirnatim rupčićima? Iznenadit ćete se! U ovoj seriji istražujemo kako su i zašto izumljeni neki svakodnevni predmeti. (S1, Ep9)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: Drugi je dan najveće kanadske dražbe u godini. Osoblje se nada da će im rijetko sveterensko vozilo Husky iz 1984. pomoći da dođu do svog cilja. (S1, Ep4)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: Nakon što su u prošloj sezoni srušili rekord, Ritchie Bros. pripremaju se za nove pobjede. Izazov počinje u Grande Praireu u Alberti gdje se radnici pripremaju za prvu dražbu godine. (S2, Ep1)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Peter na maglovitom Newfoundlandu gradi brvnaru za lovce na patke i upoznaje otočnu kulturu. Joeu i Nellie gori pod petama dok ih vatrogasci uče kako da zaštite svoju brvnaru. (S2, Ep2)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Joel daje sve od sebe u nadi da će ugovor za četiri brvnare u Michiganu uroditi narudžbom za još 16. Andreova jednostavna obnova kuhinje pretvara se u mnogo složeniji posao odo očekivanog. (S2, Ep3)

programme.title: Kraljevi rezbarenja
Carver Kings
programme.desc: Mark se brine da Ryan nije dovoljno vješt da bi izrezbario golem, moderan totemski stup. Iskusni profesionalac Pete Ryan iznenadi nove majstore poslom na kojemu moraju istesati vještine. (S1, Ep1)

programme.title: Kraljevi rezbarenja
Carver Kings
programme.desc: Američki senator naruči golemi srednjevjekovni stol za blagovaonicu te Paul odluči izrezbariti stol kakva se ni kralj ne bi posramio. No uskoro naraste napetost zbog kratkog roka i prevelikih apetita. (S1, Ep2)

programme.title: Oceanski kauboji
Cold Water Cowboys
programme.desc: Kapetan Gillett i njegov sin i prvi časnik kreću u lov na rakove kako bi pretekli konkurenciju. Hoće li preživjeti plovidbu ledenjačkim prolazom? (S2, Ep1)

programme.title: Tragači za blagom
Prospectors
programme.desc: Kameni dobitak. Travis je u potrazi za kamenom za Amandin vjenčani prsten i njegov izbor iznenađuje. Brian iskapa najveći akvamarin sezone za obitelj Busse. (S3, Ep8)

programme.title: Život u doba naftne groznice
Boomtowners
programme.desc: Zbog velikog priljeva novih ljudi, ljubavni život samaca u gradu je u krizi. Tony je uzbuđen kad mu u posjet dođe bivša cura. No hoće li moći obnoviti vezu? (S1, Ep4)

programme.title: Kako stvari funkcioniraju
How It Works
programme.desc: Doznajemo kako se izrađuju moderni nogometni golovi, a zatim otkrivamo proces proizvodnje kvalitetnog maslinovog ulja

programme.title: Lovci na bombe
Bomb Hunters
programme.desc: Sean Dockrill susreće se s mladom žrtvom eksplozije bijelog fosfora u Manitobi, što ga nagna da preispita svoj život

programme.title: Obalna straža sjeverozapadne obale SAD-a
Coast Guard Pacific Northwest
programme.desc: Ekipa zračne postaje Astoria spašava teško ozlijeđenog alpinista i riskira spašavajući mladića na rubu litice. (S1, Ep13)

programme.title: Radionica Graveyard Carz
Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: Ekipa se žuri pripremiti Dodge Daytonu iz '69. za posjet Toma Partridgea i njegove obitelji

programme.desc: Što je zajedničko ljepljivoj vrpci i instant kavi? A satelitskoj navigaciji i papirnatim rupčićima? Iznenadit ćete se! U ovoj seriji istražujemo kako su i zašto izumljeni neki svakodnevni predmeti. (S1, Ep26)

Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Wade i njegova ekipa sele bungalov za sina jednog od zaposlenika. No naizgled jednostavnu selidbu ometa neočekivana magla. (S1, Ep6)

programme.title: Potraga za žadom
Jade Fever
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin i ekipa s mukom nose tešku opremu na planinu prije nego što zbog nabujale rijeke izgube pristup terenu. (S1, Ep2)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: U Chilliwacku u Britanskoj Kolumbiji na dražbi se prodaje stari tegljač iz 1940-ih, jedan od najrjeđih velikih strojeva koje je aukcijska kuća ikad prodala u Kanadi. (S2, Ep9)

programme.title: Megaselidbe
Huge Moves
programme.desc: Inženjeri u Sjevernoj Karolini pokušavaju preseliti predgrađe puno golemih povijesnih vila kroz gradsku vrevu kako bi ga spasili od rušenja

programme.title: Opaki izumi
Wicked Inventions

WWII Air Crash Detectives
programme.desc: Ova epizoda otkriva uzroke zrakoplovne nesreće u kojoj je poginuo poljski general Sikorski i istražuje mutni svijet međunarodne špijunaže 2. svjetskoga rata i slučaj ubojstva

programme.title: Tragači za blagom
Prospectors
programme.desc: Ljeto u Stjenjaku u Koloradu obilježavaju svakodnevna nevremena s grmljavinom pa je Joe prisiljen napustiti potencijalno bogato nalazište. Obitelj Busse mora napustiti svoje nalazište. (S2, Ep3)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva

programme.desc: Samo nekoliko sati vožnje od Manhattana Beat gradi ladanjsko odmaralište za zahtjevnog naručitelja iz Francuske. Joelov australski naručitelj u posljednji čas zatraži garažu za tri auta. (S2, Ep4)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Joel i njegov tim rade 18-satne smjene na privatnom otoku gdje grade kuću za odmor od 1115 četvornih metara

programme.title: Kraljevi rezbarenja
Carver Kings

programme.title: Potraga za žadom
Jade Fever

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers

programme.title: Prijevoz brvnara
Cabin Truckers
programme.desc: Sue i Tom imaju zemljište s pogledom, ali nemaju dovoljno novca da sagrade kuću. Međutim, Wade i Jaylene našli su im idealnu staru kuću. (S1, Ep1)

programme.title: Engineered
programme.desc: Zašto je staklo fluorescentne žarulje bijelo, a ne prozirno? Koji tajni sastojak daje pivu Budweiser prepoznatljivi lagani okus? Saznajte u ovoj epizodi emisije "Projektirano"

programme.title: Opaki izumi

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: Treći je i posljednji dan najveće dražbe godine Ritchie Bros.-a u Edmontonu u Alberti. Osoblje će dati sve od sebe kako bi srušilo rekord u prodaji. (S1, Ep5)

programme.title: Veliko na prodaji
Selling Big
programme.desc: Drugi je dan dražbe u Grande Praireu i uzbuđenje raste jer je došao red na golemi hidraulički bager. No priprema tog željeznog gorostasa trajat će danima. (S2, Ep2)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Samo nekoliko sati vožnje od Manhattana Beat gradi ladanjsko odmaralište za zahtjevnog naručitelja iz Francuske. Joelov australski naručitelj u posljednji čas zatraži garažu za tri auta. (S2, Ep4)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Joel se u Kaliforniji bori s prekratkim rokom. Beat organizira ekipu kako bi dovršili golemi projekt koji samo što nisu poslali. (S2, Ep5)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Bryan stariji od zaborava spašava prastaru i zahrđalu dizalicu kako bi dovršio ribičku brvnaru u zabiti. Beat muku muči s dva golema projekta koji oduzimaju vrijeme i mjesto na gradilištu. (S2, Ep1)

programme.title: Kraljevi drva
Timber Kings
programme.desc: Peter na maglovitom Newfoundlandu gradi brvnaru za lovce na patke i upoznaje otočnu kulturu. Joeu i Nellie gori pod petama dok ih vatrogasci uče kako da zaštite svoju brvnaru. (S2, Ep2)

programme.title: Diži!
Jacked
programme.desc: Graditelji putuju u Queens kako bi spasili kuću koja trune iznutra, ali lokalne vlasti zaustavljaju operaciju. (S1, Ep9)

programme.title: Čovjek i divljina
Where the Wild Men are
programme.desc: Ben posjećuje uzgajača kokosa Neila i njegovu novu obitelj u kući od bambusa u gorju i sudjeluje u njihovoj svakodnevici u nemilosrdnim klimatskim uvjetima

programme.title: Kako stvari funkcioniraju
How It Works
programme.desc: Vidjet ćemo kako se izrađuju moderne lisičine i prozirna folija, nezaobilazna u svakoj kuhinji

programme.title: Lovci na bombe
Bomb Hunters
programme.desc: Na kraju sezone Lovci na bombe bore se za opstanak u jednoj od najtežih branši na svijetu

programme.title: Harnas -utočište za divlje životinje
Harnas, Wildlife Rescue Camp
programme.desc: U prostranoj pustinji Namib žive sićušne životinje koje je isprva teško pronaći. No znanstvenici Walter i Hartwig uspijevaju pronaći i najskrivenije insekte i reptile

programme.title: Selidbe životinja
Animal Movers
programme.desc: Konji na Havajima - 1. dio. Hladnokrvnjak Jasper putuje iz pustinje na jugu Kalifornije u novi dom na sjevernoj obali Havaja, a zatim se pridružuje trima dlakavim alpakama na zanimljivom putovanju

programme.title: Pseći najbolji prijatelj
Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi otkrivamo priču o sićušnom i uplašenom mladunčetu kojota čije je samopouzdanje uspio vratiti ris

programme.title: Nada za divljinu
Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Otvorena srca. Obustavljene su pripreme za Hopein dan otvorenih vrata jer je nestao jedan pacijent. Hoće li se događaj održati

programme.title: Superveterinar
The Supervet
programme.desc: Mački Lari potrebna je hitna operacija nakon što ju je udario automobil i napala lisica. Hoće li joj Noel uspjeti izliječiti stražnju nogu

programme.title: Nada za divljinu
Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Jedan dan u životu. Potreban je hitan smještaj za dva dabra, a rehabilitacijski centar ovaj put promatramo iz perspektive dobrovoljca

programme.title: Snaga prirode
Nature's Power Revealed
programme.desc: Utjecaj tornada i grmljavinskih oluja na svijet dobro je poznat. Saznajte kako manje poznate sile mogu uzrokovati pojave kao što su pomicanje stijena i kiša žaba i ptica

programme.title: Harnas -utočište za divlje životinje
Harnas, Wildlife Rescue Camp
programme.desc: Odlazimo na otok Halifax u Namibiji, kamo je biologinja Jessica odvela volonterku Jenny na susret s kolonijom pingvina(c)

programme.title: Hitna služba za životinje
Animal Emergency
programme.desc: Dr. Ly smatra da su višestruke ozljede majmunice koju su mu doveli uzrokovane padom te daje sve od sebe ne bi li joj spasilo život(c)

programme.title: Superveterinar
The Supervet
programme.desc: Sedmogodišnji francuski buldog ima upalu gušterače, upalu pluća i herniju diska te mu je potrebno posebno liječenje koje neće potaknuti njegove napadaje panike

programme.title: Selidbe životinja
Animal Movers
programme.desc: Konji na Havajima - 1. dio. Hladnokrvnjak Jasper putuje iz pustinje na jugu Kalifornije u novi dom na sjevernoj obali Havaja, a zatim se pridružuje trima dlakavim alpakama na zanimljivom putovanju

programme.title: Pseći najbolji prijatelj
Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi otkrivamo priču o sićušnom i uplašenom mladunčetu kojota čije je samopouzdanje uspio vratiti ris

programme.title: Hod po Zemlji
J'ai Marché Sur La Terre
programme.desc: Kako su nevjerojatne vrste preživjele na Indonezijskom arhipelagu? Mathieu Vidard susreće ljude cvijeća, komodske varane i goleme guštere koji jedu ljude, a svi se suočavaju sa životnim izazovima

programme.title: Superveterinar
The Supervet
programme.desc: Kad bračni par sazna da njihov ljubimac, njemački ovčar Otto ima tumor opasan po život, cijeli im se svijet sruši. Hoće li ga u klinici uspjeti spasiti

programme.title: Selidbe životinja
Animal Movers
programme.desc: Konji na Havajima - 2. dio. Konj Jasper nastavlja urnebesno putovanje s tri dlakave alpake

programme.title: Hod po Zemlji
J'ai Marché Sur La Terre
programme.desc: Mathieu Vidard upoznaje Sabrinu Krief koja 10 godina živi s čimpanzama te s njom pronalazi korijene našeg nevjerojatnog obiteljskog stabla u vrlo inteligentnoj skupini primata

programme.title: Harnas -utočište za divlje životinje
Harnas, Wildlife Rescue Camp
programme.desc: Nakon više mjeseci suše napokon je počelo kišno doba. No kiša dolazi takvom silinom da su neke nastambe u opasnosti od poplave, a mogle bi se i urušiti

programme.title: Život
Life
programme.desc: Introducing the extraordinary things animals and plants must do in order to survive and reproduce. Witness amazing sights, captured at 1,000 frames per second: capuchin monkeys smashing open palm nuts with stone ‘hammers’; hippos launching from the water into the air and chameleons stealing prey from a spider’s web. Sprint with cheetahs as they band together to tackle ostriches; watch dolphins form perfect rings of silt to trap fish, and swim with a seal as it struggles to escape attacking killer whales amongst the ice of Antarctica

programme.title: Životinjska siročad Paula O'Gradyja
Paul O'Grady's Animal Orphans
programme.desc: Paul posjećuje utočište SANCCOB za morske ptice, rehabilitacijski centar Moholoholo u Nacionalnom parku Kruger te se zaljubljuje u slonića Nkalu u zambijskom vrtiću za slonove Lilayi

programme.title: Rođeni u divljini
Born in the Wild
programme.desc: Klokani. Ova se epizoda odvija u Australiji, a Joy Reidenberg i Mark Evans otkrivaju nam reproduktivne tajne nekih od najčudnovatijih sisavaca na Zemlji: tobolčara

programme.title: Planet Europa i dalje
Planet Europe and Beyond
programme.desc: Preživljavanje pod svaku cijenu - pod suncem Kalaharija. Unatoč tome što i tisućama kilometara nema ni kapi vode, pustinja Kalahari ipak je stanište brojnih životinjskih i biljni vrsti. Pronađite ih zajedno s nama u ovom zanimljivom dokumentarcu

programme.title: Hod po Zemlji

programme.desc: Mathieu Vidard upoznaje Sabrinu Krief koja 10 godina živi s čimpanzama te s njom pronalazi korijene našeg nevjerojatnog obiteljskog stabla u vrlo inteligentnoj skupini primata

programme.title: Hollywood Express
programme.category: Emisija o filmu. Aktuelni novi filmovi, glavni glumci, režiseri, intervjui, Red carpet, premijere i kratki pregledi aktualnih filmova.

programme.title: Linije razdvajanja
programme.desc: Ekipa serijala "Linija razdvajanja" je bila u Baltimoreu, gdje je istraživala šta se tačno desilo nakon smrti 25-godišnjeg Freddieja Graya, uhapšenog 12. aprila 2015. godine, koji je zbog policijske brutalnosti preminuo sedmicu dana kasnije. Ovo je potaklo proteste protiv policije. Naša repoterka je pokušala dobiti odgovore od učesnika protesta, prijatelja, građanskih aktivista, ali i policijskih organa o tome šta se tačno desilo u ovom slučaju. U ovoj epizodi "Linija razdvajanja" postavljamo pitanje da li se i na koji način ovakve tragedije mogu spriječiti u budućnosti

programme.title: Zlatno doba nauke
programme.desc: Satelitski omogućen GPS, visoko tehnološki medicinski postupci, kao i mnoge moderne nauke, temelje se na radu velikih mislilaca iz prošlosti. No, dok su imena Newton, Galileo i Kopernik dobro poznata, istražujemo njihove prethodnike - naučnike u zlatnom dobu islamske nauke. Irački teorijski fizičar Jim al-Khalili vodi nas na putovanje otkrića veze između novih naučnih dostignuća i manje poznatih naučnika iz prošlosti. Fizičar Jim al-Khalili otkriva kako su islamski mislioci odigrali ključnu ulogu u objašnjavanju svjetla i optike

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, ruski predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi kao najmoćniji čovjek ove zemlje i kao jedan od najutjecajnijih političara na planeti. U četri dijela ovoga serijala bili smo u Rusiji, gdje smo se na licu mjesta uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljajali pitanje zašto većina Rusa voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta, zapravo, stanovnici Rusije žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome. U trećem dijelu serijala Tragom Putinove Rusije autor filma istražuje zašto i na koji način ruski predsjednik 25 godina nakon hladnog rata ponovno poziconira Rusiju kao globalnu vojnu silu, razvitak novog nauružanja, ali i indirektno ili aktivno učešće snaga Vojske Rusije u sukobima na istoku Ukarjine, aneksiji Krima ili ratu u Siriji. Istražuje se i kakva je uloga ruske pravoslavne crkve i njene podrške aktuelnoj vlasti, kakav je odnos s drugim vjerskim zajednicama. Naš reporter je bio u posjeti Dagestanu, gdje je razgovarao sa stanovnicima ove republike i o položaju tamošnjih muslimana

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Komunistička partija Kine, koja je na vlasti u toj zemlji više od pola stoljeća, unutar svojih redova priprema se da imenuje novu generaciju lidera. Suočava se sa sve većim pritiskom stanovništva da napravi neophodne promjene, jer je u prošlosti dolazilo do niza skandala i korupcije, u koje su bili uključeni visoki partijski zvaničnici. Kako ove promjene utječu na stanje u samoj partiji i dolazi li do sukoba mišljenja u samom rukovodstvu, istažujemo u ovoj epizodi serijala „Priče s Istoka

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Zdravstvo je često jedan od oglednih primjera zaostalosti i sistematske neuređenosti zbog koje ljudi napuštaju regiju. U ovoj epizodi upoznat ćemo MIODRAGA STOJKOVIĆA, genetičara sa svjetskim naučnim uspjesima koji se vratio u rodni Leskovac i tamo osnovao Kliniku za umjetnu oplodnju koja je postala poznata čak i izvan granica Srbije. On nam govori o prirodnosti samog povratka i njegovoj želji da se u Srbiji zaustavi bijela kuga. Drugi akter ove epizode više nije među živima, ali njegova ostavština pomaže ljudima nevesinjskoga kraja da ostanu u životu. MIHAJLO LABALO je, naime, umro prije nekoliko godina, ali je kao povratnik u Nevesinje, svojim vlastitim sredstvima izgradio bolnicu po svjetskim standardima upravo u svom rodnom Nevesinju. O Mihajlu pričaju njegovi poznanici i sugrađani koji ističu važnost bolnice kako za one koji se vraćaju u taj kraj, tako i one koji žele ostati jer im je zdravstevna njega nadohvat ruke

programme.title: Regioskop - U potrazi za porodicom
programme.desc: Rođen u Sarajevu s vodom na mozgu i prognozom da će umrijeti nakon svega par mjeseci, napušten po rođenju - Oggi Tomić nije imao sretan početak života. Uprkos svemu i zahvaljujući ljubaznosti neznanaca, 27 godina kasnije Oggi je zdrav, sretno oženjen i živi u Velikoj Britaniji. Nakon što je djetinjstvo proveo u ratu, na ivici gladi i pod neprestanom opasnošću od granata, i kada se činilo da mu život kreće pravim tokom, Oggija poziva davno izgubljena porodica. To je trenutak o kojem svako siroče sanja. Ali stvari nisu baš jednostavne. Oggi saznaje da su članovi porodice, koju je cijeli život želio pronaći, isti oni „ljudi sa brda koji su Sarajevo držali pod opsadom 1300 dana. Snažna i duboka priča o Oggijevom povratku u Bosnu i nevjerovatnom susretu s porodicom ispričana je u prvom licu. Priča o identitetu i osjećaju pripadnosti, ličnom i nacionalnom(c)

programme.title: Šta poslije svega? - Kosovo Blues
programme.desc: Američka bluz-grupa Big James and Chicago Playboys, francuski džezist Sylvain Courtney i gitarska legenda Makedonije Vlatko Stefanovski stavili su pečat na ovogodišnje izdanje festivala North City, koji se već 11 godina kontinuirano održava u sjevernom dijelu Mitrovice. Uporedo sa tenzijama, stalnim političkim trzavicama, incidentima, barikadama i nedefinisanim političkim statusom, prve junske vikende tokom protekle decenije obilježavao je i ovaj, za lokalno stanovništvo, specifičan praznik muzike. Upravo taj kontrapunkt je tema dokumentarne emisije „Šta poslije svega? - Kosovo blues novinara Al Jazeere Nebojše Grabeža i snimatelja Nenada Barbula koji otkrivaju drugačiju sliku tog podijeljenog grada

programme.title: O hokeju i Medvjedima
programme.desc: Film „O hokeju i Medvjedima snimao se od 2009. godine, a govori o uspjesima zagrebačkog hokeja kroz priču o KHL Medveščak Zagreb - od njegovog osnivanja 1961. do danas. Osim historijskog presjeka, filmom se kroz svjedočenja ključnih pojedinaca iz prošlosti kluba, ali i sadašnjih članova te vodećih ljudi kluba nastoji autentično zabilježiti fenomen popularnosti „Medvjeda kao i jedinstven navijački duh Medveščakove publike

programme.title: Zlatno doba nauke
